Description:
Parts Manager - Automotive DelershipAs a Parts Manager, you will be responsible for managing the parts department, ensuring the availability of high-quality parts, and maintaining efficient inventory processes for Chinese vehicle dealerships.Key Responsibilities:Oversee the procurement, stocking, and distribution of parts for Chinese electric vehicles, maintaining optimal inventory levels.
Develop and maintain strong relationships with parts suppliers, negotiating favorable terms and pricing agreements.
Ensure the quality and authenticity of parts, conducting regular quality checks and inspections.
Lead and motivate a team of parts personnel, providing guidance and training as needed.
Process parts orders efficiently, coordinating with service and sales departments to meet customer needs.
Monitor and control parts department expenses to maximize profitability.
Prepare regular reports on parts department performance and inventory status, presenting findings to senior management.
Provide excellent customer service to internal departments and external customers, resolving parts-related inquiries and issues.
Ensure compliance with all safety and environmental regulations related to parts storage and handling.
Identify opportunities for process improvement and cost reduction within the parts department.Skills
Skills:
Proven experience in automotive parts management, with knowledge of Chinese vehicle parts preferred.
Exceptional leadership and interpersonal skills to motivate and guide the parts team effectively.
Strong inventory management skills, including ordering, stocking, and optimizing inventory levels.
Ability to develop and maintain positive relationships with parts suppliers.
A commitment to providing outstanding customer service.
The flexibility to thrive in a fast-paced automotive environment.
